description: The Department of Parks Canada has a requirement for one (1) 6.5-6.7 meter aluminum Marine Craft, including trailer and engines. The primary use of this marine craft will be to bring Parks Canada staff to the Akami-Uapishku-Kakkasuak-Mealy Mountains National Park Reserve from Happy Valley/Goose Bay, Cartwright and or Rigolet and return.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Submission Reference Number
`PW-__MC-009-29067`

## Title (English)
6 Passenger Marine Craft

## Title (French)
Bâteau à 6 passagers

## Solicitation Number
`5P114-220149/C`

## Tender Closing Date
`2023-07-04T14:00:00` (Expired)

## Category of Procurement
Goods and Services (`GD`)

## Request for Proposal Notice Type
Request for Proposal (`RFP`)

## Tendering Method
Competitive (`IR`) - Open bidding

## Evaluation Criteria
 Lowest Price (`LPT`)

## Location of Delivery
Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador (`Newfoundland and Labrador`)

## Contracting Entity Information
- Agency: Public Works and Government Services Canada
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Place du Portage, Phase III
- Address (City): Gatineau, QC
- Address (Country): Canada
- Phone: 
- Email: 
- Fax: 

## End User Information
- Agency: Parks Canada
- Address: 30 Victoria Street
- Address (City): Gatineau
- Address (Province): Quebec
- Address (Country): Canada

## Description of the Requirement
The Department of Parks Canada is seeking a 6.5-6.7 meter aluminum Marine Craft, including trailer and engines. The primary use of this marine craft will be to transport staff between Happy Valley/Goose Bay, Cartwright, or Rigolet to the Akami-Uapishku-Kakkasuak-Mealy Mountains National Park Reserve. All deliverables must be completed by March 31st, 2024. There is no security associated with this requirement. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Supporting Documents
* [List of supporting documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023...)

## Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Status
Expired (`01`)

[Note]
During the preparation of the final response, the original file was edited a few times to encapsulate the language and to make the subsequent details align with the format of a suitable government tender announcement. 
In Government spec, specifically SOG LTE, The RFP's are considered public property, and the guidelines are followed digitally as well and it involves some sample notifications placed upon your firms' owned portal.
